communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: As a college student, my life is filled with academic pressures and social isolation, pushing me towards an escalating path of anger and resentment. My dog, Socks, and my passion for dancing are my only escapes from the constant stress. Yet, my struggles with math only add to my frustrations, fueling my aggressive online behavior.
narratives.p_intro: I'm incel_0018_64c933, an angry voice in the digital world, targeting women and society with my confrontational style. My posts are filled with rapid-fire accusations and internet rage slang, reflecting my deep-seated resentment towards dating failures and the social hierarchy that I feel oppresses me.
